articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio Scotland and BBC 5 Live commentary and follow text updates as Scotland and England meet in a Hampden Park friendly.
articles.title: Scotland host England - hosts unchanged; Foden starts in one of six alterations

articles.description: Two-time Grand Slam champion Simona Halep is banned for four years following breaches of tennis doping rules.
articles.title: Halep banned for four years for doping offences

articles.description: Tom Curry will miss England's next two Rugby World Cup games after his red card in the win over Argentina.
articles.title: Curry banned for England’s next two World Cup games

articles.description: Rate the players as Steve Clarke's Scotland take on Gareth Southgate's England in an international friendly at Hampden Park
articles.title: Scotland v England - rate the players

articles.description: Working out how best to deploy George Ford and Owen Farrell is a "really nice problem to have", says England attack coach Richard Wigglesworth.
articles.title: Ford & Farrell dilemma a 'really nice problem'

articles.description: Former Spanish Football Federation president Luis Rubiales is summoned to appear in high court on Friday over his kiss of Spain's Jenni Hermoso.
articles.title: Rubiales to appear in court over Hermoso kiss

articles.description: Kate Cross shows great awareness to run out Achini Kulasuriya after the Sri Lankan is caught meandering back to her crease at the non-striker's end.
articles.title: 'That is criminal!' - Kulasuriya run out by Cross for 0

articles.description: England are thwarted by rain in their attempt to clinch the series as the second ODI against Sri Lanka is abandoned.
articles.title: England thwarted by rain in second Sri Lanka ODI

articles.description: Aaron Rodgers will miss the rest of the NFL season as tests confirm the quarterback has a torn Achilles tendon.
articles.title: Rodgers out for NFL season with torn Achilles

articles.description: Fast bowler Jofra Archer trains with England, raising hopes he could still travel to the World Cup as a reserve to the frontline squad.
articles.title: Archer trains with England on comeback from injury
